title: A heterogeneous CuV2O6@2D-V2CTx MXene nanohybrid as a cathode material for high-capacity and stable aqueous Zn-ion batteries
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00648H, Paper
Lena S, Senthilkumar Ramasamy, Saradh Prasad Rajendra, Mohamad S. AlSalhi, Rajamohan Rajaram, Subramania A.
The CuV2O6–V2CTx nanohybrid exhibits a maximum high specific capacity of 410 mA h g−1 at 0.1C and long cycle stability of 1000 cycle at 0.5C rate with a capacity retention of 88%.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
